name: MovieQuiz📽️
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie quiz
des:
Movie Quiz - Guess the movie, hints will help you.
Single player or up to 4 players. Optimized for Alexa devices with a screen. Works perfectly without (*).
Compete with gamers all over the World. Collect the points and be the leader of the weekly world ranking.


Short info:
Players: 1-4
Game duration: 5-7 minutes per round
Devices: Echo Show + Spot, Fire TV Stick, Echo Dot etc. 
More than 80 movies, adding more every two weeks
Special: Worldwide Ranking in single player mode (playmoviequiz.com)


Compete with gamers all over the World. Collect the points and be the leader of the weekly world ranking on playmoviequiz.com.
A game round has 7 movies that need to be guessed. You don't have a clue? Ask für the next Hint! Every hint reduces the points you get for a correct answer.

Example (Single Player)
Alexa: The first two hints are: A scientist and the time. What movie are we looking for?
Player: I don't know!
Alexa: The third hint is: A young man
Player: It's Back To The Future
Alexa: Well done! You get 3 points. Let's continue with the next movie:
...


* You don't want to miss the graphical hints? Open your Alexa app, go to Activity and have a look at the Alexa cards. We provide you with images of the emojis.

Did you find a bug, have a question, feedback or a feature request? Contact me! I'm happy to improve the game for you.
Twitter: https://twitter.com/alexswetlow
E-Mail: alex@playmoviequiz.com


Built with Jovo Framework - www.jovo.tech

Emojis by Twitter (edit: rotation, white border) - CC BY 4.0 
https://twemoji.twitter.com/, https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
Tick Tock Sound by Taira Komori - CC BY 3.0 
https://freesound.org/people/Taira%20Komori/sounds/213438/, https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
